title: Research Interests
text:
Research focus is on understanding the developmental cycle of Chlamydia trachomatis
Our lab utilizes promoter reporter plasmid vectors with an array of molecular biology techniques

title: Research Interests
text:
Research focus is on understanding the developmental cycle of Chlamydia trachomatis
Our lab utilizes promoter reporter plasmid vectors with an array of molecular biology techniques

title: Research Interests
text:
Microscopy

Proficient in live-cell microscopy, confocal microscopy, and light microscopy
Skilled in utilizing imaging software such as Fiji, ImageJ, and Illustrator to process images

title: Research Interests
text:
Infectious Culture

8+ years of experience working with infectious culture in a biosafety 2+ lab setting
Skilled in eukaryotic host cell culture

title: Research Interests
text:
Molecular Biology

Research has emphasized molecular biology, particularly genetic engineering of plasmid vectors
Proficient in PCR, ddPCR, primer design/sequencing, and vector construction

title: About Me
text: Cody Appa is a PhD candidate in the Department of Biological Sciences at the University of Idaho.

title: Publications
text:
